name: Suite Macabre
description:
UNVEIL THE HORRORS!

You are Dr Kowalski’s assistant and you have received an unexpected message:

 “Dear Colleague, Dr Kowalski is neglecting his job duties and using lab equipment for private purposes – the board is very unhappy! – Persuade him to cease activity ASAP – Last seen at Dunwich Hotel”.

 You are now facing the abandoned hotel, ready to investigate the doctor’s whereabouts…

For use with MSX computers  (any generation, both real hardware and emulation supported)

Game rom image, manual in PDF format and hi-res artwork are included.
